title: Lisa Rinna brands herself the 'lip pioneer' as she announces the launch of her own makeup collection
text:
Lisa Rinna's is trying to cash in on her iconic pout.

The Real Housewives Of Beverly Hills star announced she was joining the celeb cosmetics industry as she teased the launch of her own lip line Lisa Rinna Lips Wednesday.

While the 56-year-old reality star kept details at a minimum during her post, the Rinna did dub herself a 'lip pioneer' in her caption.

Mogul in the making: Lisa Rinna teased the release of her own makeup line on Instagram Wednesday

'From the Lip Pioneer. [lipstick emoji] Coming soon. [kiss emoji]' the teaser read in full.

Each of her posts was ultra simple, featuring white typewriter-style text over a sunset-like gradient of pink and orange.

Opting not to use the space bar, the wife of Harry Hamlin wrote 'LISARINNALIPS' in the post to her grid.

Paving the path: While the 56-year-old reality star kept details at a minimum during her post, the Rinna did dub herself a 'lip pioneer' in her caption

Minimal info: There were no product details or release date in her post

Kiss off! Lisa, husband Harry and their friends from the Chicago cast weren't above poking fun at her pout in the above shot from back in 2007

Busy gal: Rinna was seen out after yoga class on the same day as her announcement

Good mood! She looked happy to see the paparazzi, even though she was in a post-exercise daze

She continued to plug the forthcoming line further on her IG Story, asking 'Are you ready?' before teasing that the line would be 'coming soon.'

The former daytime TV star is following in the footsteps of other celebrity cosmetics connoisseurs.

Kylie Jenner's lip kits helped skyrocket her fortune to the billions and Rihanna's Fenty Beauty became an instant sensation upon its release in 2017.

Cha-ching! Kylie Jenner's lip kits helped skyrocket her fortune to the billions

Even stars like Lady Gaga are throwing their hats into the beauty ring. The singer/actress just debuted her own Haus Laboratories in July.

And Lisa won't be the first in the family to join the makeup game.

Shortly before sharing her own promo, Rinna fawned over her youngest daughter Amelia's ad for brand TooFaced which was spotted on Carnaby Street in London.
description: While the 56-year-old reality star kept details at a minimum during her post, the Rinna did dub herself a 'lip pioneer' in her caption. Each of her posts was ultra simple, featuring white typewriter-style text.
